sourcesContent:
import AboutImage from '../../assets/About.jpg' import CV from '../../assets/Yajur Vashisht.pdf' import { HiDownload } from 'react-icons/hi' import Card from '../../components/Card' import data from './data' import './about.css' const About = () => { return (

About Me

{ data.map(item => ( {item.icon}
{item.title}
{item.desc} )) }

Hello! I'm Yajur Vashisht, your go-to guy for a deep dive into the electrifying realm of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Calgary. With a rich foundation in Chemical Engineering from the University of Alberta, I’ve infused my academic journey with the essence of sustainability. My skill set is a vibrant palette that ranges from web development languages like HTML to powerful programming tools like Python, all reinforced with a collection of professional certifications. But life isn't just algorithms and equations; it's about the pulse-quickening excitement found on the racetrack. My love for motorsport is more than a pastime—it's a profound source of learning, pushing the limits of aerodynamics and precision engineering. Off the circuit, you’ll find me exploring the world through the eyes of my camera or lost in thoughts about where to wander next. Each journey, whether on foot or behind the wheel, is a new chapter in my quest for discovery. If you're on the hunt for someone who can shift gears between detailed engineering analysis and creative problem-solving, let's connect. I'm just as eager to collaborate on innovative projects as I am to share stories from the last place the road took me. So, why not reach out? Together, we can steer towards a future where creativity meets functionality, and where every challenge is an opportunity for growth.

As I navigate the digital currents of my academic and personal pursuits, I'm actively seeking opportunities that will put my software engineering acumen to the test. I'm on the lookout for a role where I can contribute my blend of programming skills and engineering knowledge, ideally within an environment that values innovation and sustainable practices. In a software engineering position, I aim to leverage my experience in coding, data analysis, and system optimization, all while embracing the collaborative spirit of a team that's as driven as I am. Whether it's developing user-friendly interfaces, streamlining backend processes, or integrating cutting-edge technologies, I'm ready to dive in and make a tangible impact. If your team is looking for someone who can blend the analytical with the imaginative, crafting solutions that are as robust as they are intuitive, let's chat. I’m excited to bring my dynamic skill set to a workplace that's charting the course towards tech's new horizons.

Download Resume
) } export default About
